```{r libraries}
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(ggplate)
```


```{r loading data}
PlateData <- read_excel(
  here("Input", "PlateDesignTemplate.xlsx"), 
  range = "F1:H7",
  sheet = "6well")
head(PlateData)
```

```{r}
# plotting the 6 well plate using ggplate
plate_plot(
  data = PlateData,
  position = Well,
  value = Compound,
  label = Value,
  plate_size = 6,
  plate_type = "round",
  title = "Drug Treatment",
  title_size = 23
)
```
